content: okay what if i want to expand the "products" and become everything I own? should i just create a separate database for that or should i just use this one? I want to catalogue everything that i own in my house. some stuff might be used forever, some stuff might have expiration date like food or skincare. then some stuff need maintenance. some stuff can contain many other stuff. like pouches, shelves, etc. how do you reckon i do that?
